channel.title: Csta on C'est la Z
channel.description: Recent content in Csta on C'est la Z

item.title: CSTA 2019 - Using GitHub as a CMS
item.description: With ISTE ending, the next big event for CS treachers is the annual CSTA Conference. I first attended two years ago in Baltimore. Last year the conference, in Omaha was bigger and better in every way imaginable. I expect this year to be the best yet. I don't go to a lot of conferences so I don't have much to compare CSTA with but I like the fact that it's is about half the size of SIGCSE.
